name: Fabulous place
description:
Fabulous place is an adventure game with tactical card battles set in a fairy world.
Epic battles with fairy-tale heroes await you, which you can defeat with the help of your ingenuity.
The procedural generator creates new groups of opponents in each game from 1 to 3.
Play pre-balanced random cards without building decks.
Complete the level and get a card. Collect gold and upgrade your character.
Remove the armor from the characters and leave them naked.
As you progress through the level, you will unlock access to naked paintings.
Countless hours of gameplay in AI battles
